name: THE WAR WITH MARA 2.0
description: In Buddhist cosmology, Mara is associated with death, rebirth and desire. In other words, Mara is the personification of the forces antagonistic to enlightenment. This is the second of two depictions of Mara and our battle with the psychological forces which prevent us from seeing the truth of our existence on this ball of dirt we call home. Based on The Great Red Dragon by William Blake.5400px X 7200px by @dehiscenceart 2021.
